caption: Wowwww!!!!! Just wow!! One of the best bacon, egg and cheese bagel sandwiches I’ve had in Philly! The bagels are fantastic and anyone that gave this less then 5 stars is crazy! This is a must try!
Good bagels, but they mess up the vegan order 9/10.
Really good bagels...
The Joaquin is 🔥. Great loose bagels and cream cheese to go. They also make amazing drinks... iced dirty David Rio was tasty.
First time buying bagel in there and we love it. Nice staff and taking all the precaution about COVID-19. For sure we are going to come back.
Really good food! Love that they seem very COVID cautious, limiting people in store.
Nice

I tried using DoorDash but the website wouldnt allow me to put the corrct order in. I called the store to help me and they informed me that doordash was acting up for awhile now. In the end i irdered something else but they new what i …
My favorite is the French toast bagels

The coffee is very good. I had the lox Reuben. It was very tasty. Also, the customer service is amazing. I loved the upbeat energy of the guy who waited on us. And they have lots of flavored cream cheese and bagel options to go.

Comically bad. Asked for a bagel with butter and cream cheese. Bagel was rock hard and slightly burnt. Barely any butter or cream cheese and they put butter on one side and cream cheese on the other. It was cold when it was given to me and the bagel was ridiculously small. Not sure how this place is in business.
Two customers in the store, one cashier starts to help me, the other tells me to wait outside. Rudely. I'll never be back.

Bagels are meh. Sandwiches are expensive for not being great. Won't go here again. If you want a real bagel with actual flavor, Essen (on east passyunk near Acme) is a million times better and 100% worth the cost.

First impression was Jan 2020, I was thrilled but just never made it back. Today I did! An incredible egg bagel, nice crisp toasted outside, soft and chewy inside, a generous schmear of cream cheese and I'm now a forever customer. …
Delicious bagel sandwiches and good coffee. Also, they offer outdoor seating. Great place to grab a bagel and cup of coffee!

Yes, the bagels are good - the Joaquin is my favorite -, but what makes this place special is the service. Every member of the staff greets you with a smile when you walk in. They are polite, kind and positive. When you need a pick-me-up in …

Service was okay. I ordered over the phone and asked for 2 bagels. One plain with butter and one egg & cheese, and 2 coffees. They forgot about the coffees so I had to pay that in cash with their $5 min after already paying for the bagels. …
Great bagel menu!
Freely customer service

Great bagels! They are not too big and not too small. It's has a perfect round and fluffy consistency. I got my ultimate fave - everything bagel w cc, tomato and salt&bp - toasted! So so good. And theyre not stingy with the cc so that's …
This is my new neighborhood bagel spot. Reasonably priced fresh flavorful bagels Good coffee Who could ask for more

My absolute go-to for a bagel.  If you're caving a honesty to goodness NY bagel, then this is the place.  Made fresh daily with a ton of flavor options, there is a bagel for everybody here, especially since most of their bagels are vegan and they carry a few different flavors of vegan cream cheese.
If you are a vegetarian, get the veggie Sammy! Very good. Haven't had one like that ever.

As a native New Yorker, Ive eaten some of the best Bagels in the world, BUT THIS, THIS is one of my favorite bagel spots ever had a bagel.. their bagels are unbelieveable, nice little spot and their bacon is VERY good don't mind the price, youre paying for HIGH quality food
They are good.
My bagel was dry, cheese wasn’t melted and egg was cold.

Should’ve listened to the mixed reviews, but I decided to order anyway. Spent $37.39 for a dozen bagels and two 8oz tubs of flavored cream cheese on Caviar.  I requested any variation of about 6 bagel flavors and only received maybe a …
The quality has gone down. The bagels are dry and crumble like stale bread. Great selection of cream cheese, the scallion is the bomb. Staff is very friendly.
The bagels are hard as rocks. This chain does not produce good bagels.

The bagel place is small, clean and the bagels are very good.  There is a large variety of bagels.  They freeze great and you can have them for breakfast during the week or a snack, etc.  I had a breakfast sandwich made and it was so good!  The staff are very nice and pleasant.

I used to look forward going to this location but unfortunately every time I order food the workers are extremely rude. It’s difficult to know why - I know if I were the owner I would replaced the people who steer customers away such as myself. I’ll order from somewhere else for now on.

I used to really like this bagel shop, but have found that recently even if I ask for a bagel double toasted, that they can’t manage to toast a bagel and they’re borderline still doughy. Their breakfast sandwiches get a 3/10 for me, their …
Luke's cool
Great bagels and friendly service! Be sure to get there early on the weekends

I have an elderly aunt that lives in the passyunk square neighborhood, and I have been visiting this bagel shop for the past 3 months on the weekend. The service is amazing, and the staff is even better, from the cheerful guy at the …
People friendly,I'm in there everyday poppyseed beagle lrg.coffee blak

Sunday morning, my wife runs around corner for bagels.  Buys 6 mixed bagels.  ALL 6 bagels are stale, at least a day old.  That’s what killed Corned Beef Academy in Atlantic City years ago.  Will food purveyors never learn.  Increasing profits by selling stale goods kills businesses.

I see there’s lots of good reviews and so I came here but the bagels were dry and hard at 9am on a Monday. Overall it’s too expensive for bagels that are not fresh or quality.Not sure what was up, maybe they were selling yesterday’s leftovers that day.

Cool staff. Young, hip, nice. Damn good selection of bagels & sandwiches. Especially for it being a small shop like it is.  Affordable and has a nice little counter top that you can sit and eat at. Or you can always sit outside to enjoy.

Super friendly and nice staff at Passyunk Avenue bagels! I had a delicious wheat bagel with egg whites, avocado, and turkey bacon and a great cup iced coffee. I would highly recommend this place/location.
Great place

Great bagels. Gotta say that first. But the staff will completely forgo your order of a single toasted bagel to fill larger orders that come in after you've already put yours in. Like forget you're there and help the others first. They've lost my patronage.
Went in there when it was quiet, ordered, and despite it being slow the order still took a half an hour to turn around.
Good bagels, tea, nice service and part of Passyunk Ave. Revival. YOU MUST VISIT PASSYUNK AVE!
Fresh fluffy egg super bacon awesome little morning motivation! Will return.

Got there at 7 when they opened and the door was locked. Waited for 7 minutes before being told they still needed another 5-10 before they would be ready. Being in a rush and have already wasted 7 min this was very frustrating
I am obsessed with all the flavors and the fact that everything is cream cheese! Tastes like icing and ice cream but better. Can't wait to try more!
Great bakery products. Great to see some authentic old school traditional European style bakeries in Philadelphia. Staff are awesome as well.
Love their daily freshly made breadrolls.
The Passyunk Avenue Philly Bagels!! Best almond croissants I have ever tried. Been loyal customer for over 3 years. Exquisite quality coffee.  The best tasting sourdough. The list can go on and on...
Passyunk Avenue Philly Bagels. All the way. Best Bagels in Philadelphia. Quiches are nice. Only gave 5 stars as the rest of the range is all good!!
Awesome concept with visiting chefs from around the world. Have been three times now for different chefs and the food never disappoints. The cocktails are also great!
Brilliant food, they have amazing Chef residencies throughout the year.  Lovely atmosphere and staff.

A reverse pop-up! Fixed place with rotating guest chefs. Love it. Always a great experience, regardless of who’s cooking. Staff very professional and service smooth. Cocktails and matching wines selected to suit menu. Great value. One of our regulars!
Brilliant bagels bar with friendly staff. Lots of options in terms of fillings for their bagels and salads and they also do great coffee and 'home made' cookies and brioches. Go see yourself.
Excellent, clean and friendly staff. Brilliant prices. Would recommend of getting halloumi to tell them first as takes a while to cook properly!!
Excellent choices and service. Convenient to our hotel, its become our breakfast stop while here in Philadelphia!
A pleasingly balanced combination of humble atmosphere, delicious food and a pleasant tree-lined street view. Every time I go here for lunch I wonder why I don't more often.

Best place to grab dinner in the city of Philadelphia in my opinion. It's a 'pay what you think the food is worth' kind of place. Vegetarian menu with communal tables. The view is spectacular. All proceeds go towards social and economic welfare. A definite must if you are in Philadelphia .

Excellent food for a donation the mixed vegetable curry is yum my favorite and the donation for the food go to a good charities.Love the fact it is vegetarian. I believe it matches the spirit of altruism. Well cooked food + various & nutritive. Friendly staff :)
Been there twice, never got dissapointed. Very good bagels filled with yum ingredients. I love it!

Good selection of bagel types and fillings. Always very busy and seating was full upstairs when we arrived mid afternoon. Takeaway bar stool type seating available downstairs. Staff are friendly, chatty and quick to fulfill your order. Nice coffee too.
Great bagels ! They have a few vegetarian options but they don't have vegan. If you want to sit the place is a bit cramped. But the bagels make up for it
Friendly greeting, server recommended me his favorites and described their breakfast deal. I went with the breakfast option since it was early and it delicious.  Great food, great service

All bagels are made fresh onsite, so they cannot be any better. And they offer some delicious and special bagel sandwiches throughout the day. Oh, and their coffee is great too. Thanks Passyunk Avenue Philly Bagels!! :)

Expensive for a bagel that is just meh. I've been twice, and both times the dough was very bready, dry and crumbly instead of chewy, not what I expect from a bagel. I got a cinnamon raisin bagel with cream cheese the first time and a pork …

Passyunk Philly Bagels is my go-to bagel shop!  My husband and I stop in once or twice a week for bagel sandwiches (my favorite is bacon, egg and cheese on an everything!) and coffees.  The staff is friendly,and the service is great!  The …

I longed for the day when they would open up close to where i live, i used to live in Bellavista and for 8 years ( 1997-2005) i was spoilt. Then along came this pretender, Michael would go crazy at the garbage being produced at this moment …
Great selection of bagels. Friendly and courteous staff.
Bagels are delicious! Their flavored cream cheeses are definitely worth trying.
Good, but very disorganized!  Ordering system needs to be revised.

This place is my favorite! The bagels are amazing and the employees are super friendly.  When I was there I had a bagel with cream cheese, whitefish, lettuce, lettuce tomato and onion.  It was delicious!  If you are in the mood for some bagels, then you should check this place out.
So excited about this bagel spot! Everyone was friendly and service was quick. Food was fresh and yummy! Go check it out!

Yoooo those bagels are beat son! Try as you might, you'll never be NYC. Or even NJ for that matter. Maybe something gets lost in translation coming from 3rd & South, but the bagels (and the service) are much better over that way.

Lots of sandwich and bagel options, but the bagels my girlfriend and I had were stale, small, and disappointing.  Definitely not worth the 11-13 dollars we each paid.  With the other options in the area, I’d recommend going elsewhere.

My double egg and cheese bagel hit the spot.  Great selection of bagels.  Friendly staff and awesome nitrogen coffee! Great place for breakfast and lunch! Will definitely back!  KEREZSI REAL ESTATE: "Your Property, Our Priority" #KeepingUpWithTheKerezsis
username: The Anne Marie Kerezsi Real Estate Team

caption: Based on a everything bagel with lox cream cheese. Small crumbly bagel, not as much seasoning as you would expect with an everything. Hardly any lox pieces in cream cheese. They have a big bagel and cream cheese selection with decent coffee …
